attributes.action: Payment For an Inappropriate Emergency Department Attendence
attributes.additional_details:
Inappropriate attendance at an Emergency Department due to a self inflicted condition . i.e. Alcohol or other substance misuse
Illness deemed to be self limiting or more appropriate to being seen by a General Practitioner
Decisions and exemptions made be a senior medical/nursing practitioner for example attendances due to a failed discharge from hospital , or advised by 111
